name: Murdock, Exrx., et al. v. Murdock (et al., Aplnt.)

judges: Before Frazer, C. J., Walling, Simpson, Kephart, Schaffer and Maxey, JJ.
parties: Murdock, Exrx., et al. v. Murdock (et al., Aplnt.).

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The decree is affirmed upon the opinion of the president judge of the court below; costs to be paid by the appellant.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: J. Earl Ogle, Jr., with him A. Lloyd Adams, for appellant.
I. Morton Meyers, of Graham, Yost & Meyers, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Murdock, Exrx., et al. v. Murdock (et al., Aplnt.).
Argued May 25, 1931.
Before Frazer, C. J., Walling, Simpson, Kephart, Schaffer and Maxey, JJ.
June 27, 1931:
J. Earl Ogle, Jr., with him A. Lloyd Adams, for appellant.
I. Morton Meyers, of Graham, Yost & Meyers, for appellees.
